properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) as "COUNT" FROM TB_QNA WHERE QNA_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT SPACE_NO , SPACE_NAME FROM TB_SPACE WHERE SPACE_CATEGORY = ?
